name: Vitris (Vircon32)
description:
This version of the game is based on the original Atari arcade, so it features most of the gameplay and rules of the original versions. Try to clear as many lines as possible!

Unlike most of my games for Vircon32 console, it is likely that I will release an updated version of this game in the future. It won't change the core gameplay but it will add more game modes.

This game is open source, you can find the sources at the website or browse the code directly on GitHub.
